description: A whimsical tale of a chocolate box's nervous excitement on Valentine's Day due to its unique contents.
title: Fluttering Hearts
n_1: On a bright Valentine's Day, ChocoBox felt an unusual fluttering inside.
c2_1: It's us, the butter-flies, bringing love!
n_2: Each butter-fly carried a tiny heart, filling ChocoBox with excitement.
c2_2: We're here to spread the Valentine cheer!
n_3: ChocoBox, brimming with butterflies, awaited its special moment.
n_4: As the lid opened, ChocoBox and the butter-flies shared love with the world.
